sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Common Carrier Liability Act.

sections.heading: That whenever any property is received by a
sections.text:
common carrier, to be transported from one place to another, within or
without this state, it shall not be lawful for such carrier to limit his
common law liability safely to deliver such property at the place to which
the same is to be transported by any stipulation or limitation expressed in
the receipt given for such property.
